title: FS individually -Lundgren Chi - epdg, pd350, pd150

posts.post_title: FS individually -Lundgren Chi - epdg, pd350, pd150
posts.post_content: Email me if you need any or all. I will not be on here much for a few weeks but will check my gmail.  [url]Esharpwork@gmail.com[/url]
Back image is reversed from the front image above.

Eric, good luck with the sale......

Tough group to acquire. Mine not for sale..... ;)

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=242976&d=1472225777[/IMG]
I hope that this doesn't de-rail the thread...but I've heard that EPDG combo is insanely hard and rare...truth to that?
Eric, I'm surprised!  That is a great group to put together.  Good luck with the sale.

[quote name="scottglevy" post=1577355]I hope that this doesn't de-rail the thread...but I've heard that EPDG combo is insanely hard and rare...truth to that?[/QUOTE]

It is as hard if not harder than the PD350.  The pop reports are off partly due to me busting three of the tough backs out. Finding two out of three is doable, but all three on a reasonable budget is not easy.

[quote name="edjs" post=1577375]Eric, I'm surprised!  That is a great group to put together.  Good luck with the sale.[/QUOTE]

Yeah man, I'm done.  Have cows and crops to stress over.. Raising grass fed organic beef that love kelp is not cheap!
Bump.  Will work on price if someone wants the run. Will leave these up for the weekend and then they go back in the safe and off the market.
